name: course-selling-app
description: - initiliaze a new Nodejs.project - Add Express,jsonwebToken to its as a dependency - Create index.js - Add route skeleton for user login,signup,purchase a course,see course - Add routes for admin login,admin signup,create a course , delete a course, add a course content - Add middleaware for user and admin auth - Add a database (mongodb), use dotenv to store the database connection string - define the schema for user, Admin,Course,Purchase - Complete the routes for user login,signup,purchase a course,see course (Extra points - Uese express routing to better structure your routes) - Create the frontend
